amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used by the Department of the Interior, the Environmental Protection Agency, or any other Federal agency to lease or purchase new light duty vehicles for any executive fleet or agency's fleet inventory, except in accordance with Presidential Memorandum-Federal Fleet Performance, dated May 24, 2011.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used by the Department of the Interior, the Environmental Protection Agency, or any other Federal agency to lease or purchase new light duty vehicles for any executive fleet or agency's fleet inventory, except in accordance with Presidential Memorandum-Federal Fleet Performance, dated May 24, 2011.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A068) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A068) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A068) offered by Mr. Engel.
